Name: Aegis with Apis Head
Description: The head of a bull, symbolizing the god Apis, is on the top of this aegis, or shield. Apis wears the horned sun disk crown decorated with the cobra and surmounted by two feathers.A small stand is behind the crown to support it. Apis wears a long wig. The back of the god's neck is elongated so it may be fixed to another stand. The aegis is finely decorated.
